title: Sparklers held near ceiling started Swiss ski resort fire, investigators believe
summary: Investigators say indoor sparklers likely ignited ceiling materials at a packed resort bar, prompting a rapid blaze and a multi-agency search for missing teens.
key_points: Fire started by sparklers held near the ceiling
Multiple teenagers remain missing after the incident
Officials are reviewing safety protocols at the resort

articles.headline: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
Sparklers held near ceiling started Swiss ski resort fire, investigators believe
Fire at Swiss resort bar kills 40 people, injures over 100

title: Man dies after being pulled from sea as search continues for two missing off Withernsea
summary: Coastguard teams continue searching after multiple people were pulled from the water near Withernsea, with one confirmed fatality and two still missing.
key_points: Search continues along the East Riding coastline
Emergency services warn of dangerous winter sea conditions

articles.headline: Two die and third person missing after coastal search
Man dies after being pulled from sea as search continues for two missing off Withernsea
Two dead after being pulled from sea with search to continue

title: Watch: Earthquake interrupts Mexico's president during news conference
summary: A moderate earthquake shook Mexico City during a live news conference, prompting a brief evacuation and renewed concerns about seismic preparedness.
key_points: Preparedness drills highlighted after the quake

articles.headline: Watch: Earthquake interrupts Mexico's president during news conference
Mexico City residents report shaking after quake

sub_stories.title: Seismic alerts tested during live event

title: Senate negotiators race to finalize border security package
summary: U.S. lawmakers are nearing a deal on a border security package as funding deadlines loom, with disagreements over asylum processing and enforcement levels.
key_points: Asylum processing remains a sticking point

articles.headline: Senate negotiators race to finalize border security package

title: Historic heatwave pushes Australian energy grid to the limit
summary: A multi-day heatwave has spiked power demand across eastern Australia, forcing utilities to issue conservation alerts and open cooling centers.
key_points: Utilities ask residents to limit peak-hour usage
Cooling centers opened in major cities

articles.headline: Historic heatwave pushes Australian energy grid to the limit
Utilities urge conservation as temperatures soar
